text: Fiona Dourif (born October 30, 1981) is an American actress and producer. She is known for her role as Bart Curlish in BBC America's Dirk Gently's Holistic Detective Agency and as Nica Pierce in the 2013 horror movie Curse of Chucky and its 2017 follow-up Cult of Chucky, both of which are part of the Child's Play franchise. In 2018, she was cast as Good Leader Tavis in the USA Network series The Purge. Her father is actor Brad Dourif. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from New York (state)
title: Fiona Dourif
